name: Performapal Ballad
desc:
Pendulum Effect
Once per turn, at the start of the Damage Step, when a "Performapal" monster you control battles an opponent's face-up monster: You can make that opponent's monster lose 600 ATK (even if this card leaves the field).

Monster Effect
If a "Performapal" monster you control attacks, after damage calculation: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; that opponent's monster loses ATK equal to the ATK of that "Performapal" monster.
